title: SRAM XPLR gravel group debuts Rockshox fork, dropper, wide gearing & MOTO wheels
content:
The all-new SRAM XPLR gravel bike component line goes beyond the drivetrain, adding a Rockshox Rudy suspension fork, moto-inspired single-wall carbon rimmed Zipp wheels, and an impressive new air-sprung Reverb AXS dropper post that both drops and suspends the rider. All of this moves forward with the help of wider 10-44 12-speed cassettes, new chainrings, [â€¦]
